title: Kennen Ult invisible
body:
My friends and I were playing the other night and we faced a Kennen.  The problem was that when he ulted, no one on my team could see the ult.  We'd take tons of damage and get stunned, but there were no visual indicators whatsoever.  Normally, I'd repair my client and move on, but this was happening to every single person on my team.  No one could see the ult.  

I don't know what else to say except that it was a Karate Kennen skin that was being used, though I'm not sure if that really matters.  Hope the problem can be found out.

replies.body:
Hey FatedTitan - 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.
3 months later, just had a game with the same problem, invisible kennen ulti

Hey ProfessorShyvana - 

To give you a quick update here - The issue isn't something that we can reproduce 100% of the time, making the issue hard to track down. That said, I have sent out a compatibility test internally to see if various PC configurations may be having this issue v. others - specifically graphics cards. We're actively working on trying to resolve this 'cause it's a really shitty situation. D:
Just happened to me, please give words if you know how to prevent the issue.

Ya today while i was duoing with a friend i went kennen mid and every one in the enemy team said that my ulti was invisible to them but my team and i could clearly see the ulti and i was using classic kennen no skin just as an fyi
